name: mris_make_surfaces
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: Positions the tessellation of the cortical surface at the white matter surface, then the gray matter surface, generating surface files along with a curvature file and a surface file for cortical thickness.

inputs.description: Name of the subject
inputs.name: Subject Name

inputs.description: Brain hemisphere (r or l)
inputs.name: Hemisphere

inputs.description: Output name for white surface (default is 'white'). Set to NOWHITE to generate but not save white surface.
inputs.name: White Surface Name

inputs.description: Output name for pial surface (default is 'pial').
inputs.name: Pial Surface Name

inputs.description: Only generate white matter surface.
inputs.name: White-only Flag

inputs.description: Only generate pial surface.
inputs.name: No-White Flag

inputs.description: Specify a white surface to start with.
inputs.name: Original White Surface

inputs.description: Specify a pial surface to start with.
inputs.name: Original Pial Surface

inputs.description: Omit self-intersection and only generate gray/white surface.
inputs.name: Q Flag

inputs.description: Set maximum gray scale value.
inputs.name: Maximum Gray Scale

inputs.description: Do not create curvature and area files from white matter surface.
inputs.name: C Flag

inputs.description: Set to 0 to turn off creation of cortex label file.
inputs.name: Cortex Flag

inputs.description: Average curvature values a number of times (default=10).
inputs.name: Average Curvature

inputs.description: Settle WM surface at first peak in intensity profile instead of highest.
inputs.name: First WM Peak Flag

inputs.description: Unused argument
inputs.name: W Argument

inputs.description: Average pial curvature values a max of a number of times (default=16).
inputs.name: Average Pial Curvature

inputs.description: Average white curvature values a max of a number of times (default=4).
inputs.name: Average White Curvature

inputs.description: Specify T1 volume (default is brain).
inputs.name: T1 Volume

inputs.description: Specify white volume and <hires> option.
inputs.name: White Volume

inputs.description: Run longitudinal analysis.
inputs.name: Longitudinal Flag

inputs.description: Set a threshold for the multi-echo mprage dura avoidance.
inputs.name: Dura Threshold

inputs.description: Specify SUBJECTS_DIR.
inputs.name: Subjects Directory

inputs.description: Erase cerebellar labeled voxels if aseg is loaded.
inputs.name: Erase Cerebellum Flag

inputs.description: Weighting of WM mean in calculating T2 threshold of disallowed GM values, default=3.
inputs.name: WM Weight

inputs.description: # of sigmas above the mean to allow gray matter T2 intensities.
inputs.name: Sigma Above

inputs.description: # of sigmas below the mean to allow gray matter T2 intensities.
inputs.name: Sigma Below

inputs.description: Specify threshold for min T2 value allowed to be interior to the cortical ribbon.
inputs.name: Min T2 Inside

inputs.description: Specify threshold for max T2 value allowed to be interior to the cortical ribbon.
inputs.name: Max T2 Inside

inputs.description: Specify threshold for min T2 value outside of pial surface that will cause surface to deform outwards.
inputs.name: Min T2 Outside

inputs.description: Specify threshold for max T2 value outside of pial surface that will cause surface to deform outwards.
inputs.name: Max T2 Outside

inputs.description: Specify the pct of the histo peak in the local gm histogram to use as threshold for finding the local inside and outside gm thresholds.
inputs.name: Min Peak %

inputs.description: Turn on hires options in MRIScomputeBorderValues_new(). May not be helpful.
inputs.name: Border Vals Hires

inputs.description: Turn off face normal unitization.
inputs.name: No Unitize

inputs.description: Set weight of intensity cost.
inputs.name: Intensity Cost

inputs.name: Curvature Cost

inputs.name: Tangential Spring Cost

inputs.description: Set weight of normal spring cost.
inputs.name: Normal Spring Cost

inputs.description: Set weight of repulsion force.
inputs.name: Repulsion Cost
